{{Useful Function}}
<lowercasetitle></lowercasetitle>

This function find in name map [DM] For Race.
==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">bool isMapDM()</syntaxhighlight>

===Required Arguments===
* none.

===Returns===

Returns ''true'' if the [[/map.md|map]] find in name [DM] , ''false'' if not find in name map [DM] .

==Code==
<section name="Server" class="server" show="true">
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
function isMapDM()
   if getMapName():upper():find("[DM]") or getMapName():upper():find("=DM=") or getMapName():upper():find("DM") then
		return true
	else
		return false
	end
end
</syntaxhighlight>
</section>

==Example== 
This example will check in name map [DM].
<section name="Server" class="server" show="true">
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
addCommandHandler("show",function(player)
if ( isMapDM() ) then
outputChatBox("This Map DM",player,255,0,0,true)
end
end)
</syntaxhighlight>
</section>
